```{r}
df <- read_csv("https://osf.io/4ay9x/download")
df <- df %>% filter(occ2012==0800)
```

### Define the target variable i.e. earnings per hour
```{r}
# define wage and gender variables
df <- df %>% 
  mutate(w=earnwke/uhours) %>%
  mutate(female = as.numeric(sex==2)) %>%
  mutate(male = as.numeric(sex==1)) %>% 
  mutate(lnw= log(w)) 
#df<-data_all %>%mutate(female=as.numeric(sex==2)) %>%mutate(w=earnwke/uhours) %>%mutate(lnw=log(w)) %>%mutate(agesq=age^2)
```
